# Jinsoo Heo

> Personal homepage of Jinsoo Heo (허진수), a DevOps Engineer based in Seoul, Korea. 8+ years in software engineering, building infrastructure for DeFi protocols.

## Links

- [Homepage](https://koriel.kr/): Terminal-themed personal landing page
- [Blog](https://blog.koriel.kr): Technical blog about DevOps, Kubernetes, Web3, and infrastructure engineering
- [Resume](https://koriel.kr/resume/resume.pdf): PDF resume
- [GitHub](https://github.com/devkoriel): Open source projects and contributions
- [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/devkoriel): Professional profile
- [X](https://x.com/devkoriel): Social media
- [Telegram](https://t.me/devkoriel): Direct contact
- [Telegram Channel](https://t.me/whoskoriel): 코리엘의 리모트 라이프
